lines.text: Luke, Chapter 4, Verse 23. Physician heal thyself.
Zoe, Chapter 1, shut your cakehole
How rude...
Alfie, I've decided I want to get cremated.
Come on then, get your coat.

[after Minty asks him about advice on weddings]
Yes I've had three wives. One cheated on me, one Didn't make it past reception, and one shot me. What would you like to know?
You know what they say, darlin', the course of true love never runs smooth.
I don't want smooth, just something that's less like roller-blading down the Himalayas with a rocket up me backside.
I want to be with Kat, Kat wants nothing to do with me. I don't want to be with Zoe, Zoe wants everything to do with me. Happy Christmas.
[repeated line]
Get outta ma pub!
[repeated line]
Ooh, I say!
You don't wanna go upsetting the Mitchells, they have long memories.
Honestly, Si, you don't know whether you're Arthur or Martha!
This ain't the Sound of Music, he's not going to marry you.
You're a wave short of an ocean, aint ya?
What do ya take me for? Some kind of ice cream?
What do you take me for? Some kind of Donut?
What do you take me for? Some kind of Pilchard?

[referring to punk Mary]
You know what the bible said, "Help thy neighbour".
But it didn't say, "Help thy common slut that won't help thyself."

[on seeing a miserable-looking Pauline]
They cancelled public hangings or something?
My sister is my mum. My Dad is my granddad and my uncle, and my uncle is my dad.
[When big Mo was 'Miss Whiplash', Little Mo answers the phone]
You've been a naughty boy?... What did you do?... Oh I'm sure you didn't mean to, you sound ever so sorry.
[Talking to Charlie about Kat]
She's got a loud mouth and a foul temper. I dunno where she gets it from.
I'll tell you what, pal, you talk to me like that again and you're gonna get a dry slap.
So they killed him then, because he didn't fit in?
Dot, I'm not saying that.
Yes you are, you've said it very well. He was always a help to me. If you had no respect for him while he was alive, the least you can do is have respect for him now he's dead!
[breaks down]
RICKY!
Aw, Pat, what have you done to me?
[Pat and Peggy are fighting over Frank Butcher]

[Slaps Pat]
You Bitch

[Slaps Peggy]
You Cow
